column1: He has also claimed that when this raid took place, he never took any money on
to his hand, but PW-01 forcibly attempted to  put some money into his trouser
pocket, and he was arrested while this attempt was  made.
On  behalf  of  the  appellant,  Development  Officer  of  the  Divisional  Secretariat
Office of Beliatta has been called to give evidence as to the Wine Store situated
